person_say: I've been lacking motivation to study lately, and I have no interest in it. Are there any ways to boost my study drive?
animal_say: Feeling unmotivated can be tough! What do you think is causing your lack of interest in studying?

person_say: I think it might be a combination of feeling overwhelmed and not knowing where to start. I really want to study but just can't seem to get into it.
animal_say: I hear you! There’s a helpful bee named Bizy who specializes in time management and tackling overwhelm. Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds wonderful! I'd love to get some tips on time management and overcoming my feelings of being overwhelmed.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will help you conquer that overwhelm and boost your time management skills. Let’s go meet her!
